name: Please Sign Here (Fraser Craill)
description:
Explore a sundered space station set in the vast emptiness of space as a lone deep space delivery drone on a mission
to deliver packages to the deceased crew of the station. Wander the dark corridors and follow the blood to the long gone recipients of each parcel in this top-down pixel art horror exploration game.

Credits:

- Stefan Petrie

- Matthew Bland

- Fraser Craill

- Lera Blokhina

(PS: Updates to come).
